Package com.company

Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
com.company.Character
com.company.Zombie
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BucketHeadZombie, ConeHeadZombie, FootBallPlayerZombie, NormalZombie
public class Zombie
extends Character
This is Zombie class. this class extends Character The different types of Zombies such as ConeZombie ,... extends this class. The speed filed contains the speed and the attackPower contains the ability of destroying of each zombie
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rahmani & Nami Modarresi
See Also:
Serialized Form

      HP - The health point
      speed - The speed of zombie
      attackPower - The ability of destroying
      elementPath - the path of element gif or image
